item.title: Christie's Hong Kong 30th Anniversary | Hong Kong Spring Auctions | May 2016
item.description:
Christie's Hong Kong 30th Anniversary | Hong Kong Spring Auctions | May 2016

To mark the 30th anniversary of Christie's in Asia, our Hong Kong 2016 Spring Auctions feature an array of curated highlights. These include 30 Years: The Sale, which brings together 30 exceptional lots representing the most significant and important pieces in their respective categories, and provides an opportunity to fully explore the evolution of taste in Asia.

item.title: Elton John's Warhol/Basquiat Collaboration a Sotheby's Paris Highlight | Sotheby's
item.description:
Elton John's Warhol/Basquiat Collaboration a Sotheby's Paris Highlight | Sotheby's

Discover highlights from our Art Contemporain auction in Paris on 7 and 8 June 2016, including a collaborative work by Andy Warhol and Jean-Michel Basquiat from the collection of Sir Elton John and David Furnish.
